summary: "The Mask of Zorro" is a 1998 American Western movie about the fictional hero Zorro. The original Zorro, Don Diego (played by Anthony Hopkins), escapes prison to find his daughter and avenge his wife's death. He is helped by a younger Zorro (Antonio Banderas) who has his own reasons to fight the corrupt governor. The film was a big success, making over $250 million. It was directed by Martin Campbell and had a sequel in 2005 called "The Legend of Zorro."
title: The Mask of Zorro
